about: Senior Software Engineer with 20+ years of experience building and scaling distributed systems, cloud platforms, and large-scale service-oriented architectures. At Klarna, I'm part of a team designing and operating bank-grade cloud deployment platforms that power mission-critical financial services for over 150 engineering teams. We manage centralized AWS infrastructure supporting hundreds of microservices and thousands of ECS tasks across all environments.

Expert in programming languages (Go, TypeScript, Python, C#, Perl) and cloud-native technologies including AWS (ECS, Lambda, Step Functions, EC2, RDS, VPC, Route53, S3, SQS, DynamoDB, ASG, CDK, CloudFormation), Kubernetes (OpenShift, ArgoCD with operator development experience), Docker, and infrastructure automation (Ansible, Terraform). Extensive experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, DB2, DynamoDB, Solr), message queues (ActiveMQ, SQS), and full-stack development including Vue.js.

Proven track record in system architecture design, performance optimization, capacity planning, and troubleshooting complex distributed systems. Successfully managed large-scale R&D and test server infrastructure, both on-premise and cloud-based. Experienced in high-availability testing, server performance analysis, and supporting customer deployments.

Strong technical leader with experience mentoring engineers, leading cross-functional teams, and driving technical initiatives. Former QA team lead with extensive background in large-scale test automation, CI/CD pipeline setup (Jenkins, GitLab, Git/Gerrit), and systematic testing of enterprise-grade systems. Experience managing infrastructure for development teams and enabling smooth deployment workflows with green/blue and canary strategies.

Passionate about automation, AI/ML technologies, and process efficiency. Implemented AI-powered search solutions using natural language processing and fuzzy matching. Keen interest in emerging technologies including Generative AI, LLM integration, and agentic systems. Firm believer in keeping things simple (Unix/Linux philosophy) and maintaining high quality in all work. Strong advocate for best practices in infrastructure as code, observability, and DevOps culture.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer | Code-to-Cloud Platform Team
experience.description: Klarna Engineering Platform (KEP) Domain - Code-to-Cloud is part of Klarna Engineering Platform, providing a common, stable platform for Klarna services.
bullets: Managed centralized cloud deployment platform for most of Klarna's services, ensuring secure, stable, cost-efficient operations
Designed and maintained bank-grade applications with auto-scaling and high availability for production workloads

Built and maintained AWS automation platform enabling Klarna engineers to manage service deployments, scaling, networking, certificates, and secrets across dev, staging, performance, and production environments, including upgrade and deployment workflows with green/blue and canary promotion strategies
Migrated client code from TypeScript to Go to improve performance and maintainability
Led migration of Jenkins jobs for ECS sidecar upgrades and ECS daemon service update workflow to AWS Code Pipeline, modernizing CI/CD workflows and deployment automation
Monitored and maintained infrastructure metrics monitoring systems, troubleshooting issues and making incremental improvements
Participated in go-to person rotation and on-call activities, providing 24/7 support for critical infrastructure and ensuring high availability
experience.technologies: TypeScript, Go, AWS ECS, AWS Step Functions, AWS Lambda, AWS Code Pipeline, Jenkins

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Golang developer at payment team. Integrated Telness's system with Stripe API for billing. The automated digital telco enabler.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained Media Asset Management system, a modular and distributed system, and participated in modernization efforts using Kubernetes and ArgoCD (GitOps)
Worked on search subsystem, including Solr indexing and complex query implementation for search results
Refactored search subsystem code extensively, significantly improving performance and stability while reducing CPU and memory usage
Implemented AI search POC in Python with fuzzy search capabilities using human-readable words for videos, enabling direct navigation to specific video positions, demonstrated at an exhibition
Developed customer-specific projects including media transfer plugins in Golang, integrating with Adobe Cloud, Endeavour, Real Madrid, and other clients
Maintained system test suite with Python
experience.technologies: Golang, Perl, Python, C#, C, C++, Kubernetes, ArgoCD, REST API, Microservices, ActiveMQ, Postgres, DB2, Oracle, Solr, Memcache, RedHat, AWS, S3, Cloud Native

Designed and executed large-scale performance tests
Set up and automated test clusters with load balancer in AWS
Conducted high availability, characteristics, and stability testing
Managed development and live operations, supporting product roll-out and troubleshooting

experience.title: System Tester
experience.description: System test of RBS (Radio Base Station) platform. Write/Execute test-case with Erlang CT/OTP. System test automation. Performance/Capacity/Robustness/Reliability test.

experience.title: TCM & Test Automation Developer
experience.description: Test Configuration Management (TCM) of Core IMS, CSCF (SIP server). Setup test environment for function test, both real hardware and simulator. Software version control and test configuration management. Maintain Linux servers in lab. Function test automation (Perl, Linux shell). Develop test automation tools and scripts for system load test. System test.

experience.title: I&V Engineer / System Test Leader / Function Tester / Software Engineer
experience.location: Stockholm, Sweden | Beijing, China | Shanghai, China
experience.description: Various roles including function test of Core IMS, CSCF (SIP server) and Media Resource Server MRF, team leadership of IPWorks system test (6 team members), and block designer/function tester of AXE core network for CDMA2000.

projects.title: Klarna Code-to-Cloud Platform
description: Contributed to Klarna Engineering Platform's Code-to-Cloud (C2C) team, managing the centralized cloud deployment platform for most of Klarna's services. Worked within the existing platform structure to improve and extend features, focusing on service lifecycle management, deployments, scaling, and infrastructure monitoring.
Developed automated features for AWS infrastructure management and improved platform stability and efficiency. Migrated client code from TypeScript to Go to improve performance and maintainability.

Led migration of Jenkins jobs for ECS sidecar upgrades and ECS daemon service update workflow to AWS Code Pipeline, modernizing CI/CD workflows and deployment automation. Maintained and improved upgrade and deployment workflows (green/blue and canary promotion strategies), fixing bugs and implementing enhancements.
projects.technologies: TypeScript, Go, AWS ECS, AWS Step Functions, AWS Lambda, AWS Code Pipeline, Jenkins, AWS Cloud Infrastructure

projects.title: Vizrt MAM Development
description: Developed and maintained Media Asset Management system, a modular and distributed system. Participated in modernization efforts using Kubernetes and ArgoCD (GitOps) to migrate from legacy infrastructure.

Worked extensively on search subsystem, including Solr indexing and complex query implementation for search results. Refactored search subsystem code extensively, significantly improving performance and stability while reducing CPU and memory usage.
Implemented AI search POC in Python with fuzzy search capabilities using human-readable words for videos, enabling direct navigation to specific video positions. Demonstrated at an exhibition.
Developed customer-specific projects including media transfer plugins in Golang, integrating with Adobe Cloud, Endeavour, Real Madrid, and other clients. Maintained system test suite with Python.
projects.technologies: Golang, Perl, Python, C#, C, C++, Kubernetes, ArgoCD, REST API, Microservices, ActiveMQ, Postgres, DB2, Oracle, Solr, Memcache, RedHat, AWS, S3, Cloud Native

projects.title: Connode Solution Test
description: System test, function test, and release management of an IoT product for smart metering projects. Narrowband IoT RF mesh network using IETF 6LoWPAN (IPv6)/RPL CoAP open protocols.
Responsible for test planning, test execution, test automation, and CI setup and maintenance. Designed and executed large-scale performance tests.

Set up and automated test clusters with load balancer in AWS. Conducted high availability, characteristics, and stability testing. Setup continuous integration for both server and node side, created and maintained smoke tests and daily regression test scripts.
projects.technologies: Python, Perl, CoAP, 6LoWPAN, Java, C, RTOS, IoT, Texas Instruments Radio Chips, AWS, MongoDB

projects.title: RBS Platform System Test
description: System test of RBS (Radio Base Station) platform. Agile/Scrum way of working. Mainly used Erlang/OTP/CT for test automation. All test-cases written in Erlang with Common Test framework. Also used Perl/Linux shell scripts as helpers. Performed integration and system tests for different types of RBS platform, for WCDMA/LTE, multi-standard RBS etc.
projects.technologies: Erlang, OTP, CT, Perl, Linux Shell

projects.title: CSCF Test Environment Setup and Test Automation
description: Setup and maintained test environment for Core IMS, CSCF (SIP server). Used Perl and Linux shell scripts to create convenient work environment for testers. Ensured all servers were in healthy condition. Involved with MAIA sub-project - simulation of telecom server platform (TSP), responsible for integration to R&D development/test environment using VMware/Virtualbox, Soft-IP-routing (ospfd, zebra, openVPN), serving 20+ developers/testers.
projects.technologies: Perl, Linux Shell, VMware, Virtualbox, ClearCase, Subversion

projects.title: CSCF Test Automation and Regression Test
description: Troubleshooting failed test-cases, corrected errors in test-cases, wrote trouble reports if faults were found in CSCF. Test-case automation and maintained daily runs. Ensured all legacy functions were not broken when new CSCF releases were delivered. Managed around 6000 test-cases running every day.

projects.title: IPworks Development
description: IPworks mainly works as DNS/DHCP servers. Supports internal/external DNS, ACL, A/SRV/ENUM records, Dynamic DNS. Also has functions for ERH (External Resource handler) and SS7. MySQL cluster used for back-end data management. One of the key components of the whole IMS architecture. Agile/Scrum way of working.

projects.title: CSCF/MRF Development
description: Developed test-cases in Spirent (Protocol testing tool), function test of CSCF/MRF, working with protocols like SIP, diameter, LDAP, TCP/UDP etc, IP networking. Tested several features including system counter accuracy, Lawful Intercept, Number Portability, Third party registration etc.

projects.title: CDMA 2000 Development
description: AXE platform block design and function test, using Ericsson PLEX-C/ASA assembler language. FOA (Install First Official Application) in customer site.
